item.title: activesupport: `ActiveSupport::JSON.encode` supports CIDR notation.
item.description:
* `ActiveSupport::JSON.encode` supports CIDR notation.
Previously:
```ruby ActiveSupport::JSON.encode(IPAddr.new("172.16.0.0/24")) # => "\"172.16.0.0\"" ```
After this change:
```ruby ActiveSupport::JSON.encode(IPAddr.new("172.16.0.0/24")) # => "\"172.16.0.0/24\"" ```
*Taketo Takashima*
item.author: Taketo Takashima
